title: WHY MARXISM NEEDS HEIDEGGER, DUGIN, AND ZIZEK | HAZ AL-DIN
description:
IN THIS EPISODE OF ESCAPING THE CAVE WITH DR. GARRIDO, EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN OF THE AMERICAN COMMUNIST PARTY, HAZ AL-DIN, JOINS TO DISCUSS HIS MOST POLEMINAL POSITIONS: WHAT HE DRAWS FROM THINKERS OUTSIDE THE MARXIST CANON LIKE HEIDEGGER, ZIZEK, DUGIN, LACAN, AND FRENCH THEORY.
